duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide administrative and clerical support to a department(s) and/or group of team members and managers.
Assist in coordinating administrative activities and operations to secure efficiency and compliance with company policies.
Manage and maintain files, records, and documents, ensuring accuracy and accessibility.
Handle incoming and outgoing communication and correspondence, maintaining professionalism and confidentiality.
Assist in scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements for team members and managers.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Business Administration or related field (Bachelor's preferred)
